name: Jeimy Arrieta
description: '''Jeimy de Jes√∫s Arrieta Ramos'''{{family name footnote|Arrieta|Ramos|lang=Spanish}} (born 1996 or 1997) is a Colombian accordionist. She won the child accordionist competition of the [[Vallenato Legend Festival]] in 2007, and was crowned vallenato queen for winning the {{lang|es|acordeonera mayor}} competition in 2020.
